title: [Sounds Around the Mire]
description: Metal pipes of various widths and lengths travel through the walls and ceiling of the wagon.  Tucked amind the crisscrossed mess is a rusted iron case.  Bits and pieces of jewelry and other adornments hang from the twisted labyrinth, displayed for all to see.  A cleared path leads through the mess to a small archway covered with a tattered blanket.

Metal pipes of various widths and lengths travel through the walls and ceiling of the wagon.  Tucked amid the crisscrossed mess is a rusted iron case.  Bits and pieces of jewelry and other adornments hang from the twisted labyrinth, displayed for all to see.  A cleared path leads through the mess to a small archway covered with a tattered blanket.
